rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large entrance area with floor-to-ceiling windows to welcome natural light, designed in Scandinavian minimalism style.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and modern Scandinavian decor. Integrates an open plan with the dining area through a central courtyard view.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open space adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family gatherings; incorporates natural lighting via floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional Scandinavian style kitchen with an emphasis on clean lines and efficient storage. Features a window that overlooks the courtyard.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light. Vastu-compliant orientation for harmony.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room that maintains the Scandinavian simplicity and incorporates a window for ample daylight.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with emphasis on natural light and minimalistic design. Vastu-aligned placement enhances productivity.

openings.description: Open passage connecting living room to outdoor space.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: Room designed with Scandinavian simplicity for children's comfort; features large windows ensuring ample natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Enhanced guest room offering additional space and natural lighting from floor-to-ceiling windows, adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-lit ensuite bathroom with Scandinavian minimalist fixtures; includes a window for light but maintains privacy.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace that overlooks the central courtyard through floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance productivity.

openings.description: Open passage connecting the study/office to outdoor relaxation space.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Room offering quiet retreat with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu guidelines ensure favorable placement.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom integrated with the bedroom area, designed with Scandinavian efficiency in mind; includes a window for natural ventilation.
